title: Can we finally re-code/rework Knock-ups yet?
body:
They are incredibly long, and they cannot be reduced by tenacity.
It's been this way for too long, and the lazy coding needs to stop. We NEED to fix it.

replies.body: Lol I don't know why but I found this to be funny.

> [{quoted}](name=LeftyRaydy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ur48E40l,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-18T23:53:17.010+0000)
>
> Lol I don't know why but I found this to be funny.

Sometimes the only thing you can say is "no".

Something isn’t “lazy coding” when it’s intended in the first place.

Knockups aren’t affected by tenacity not because Riot didn’t want to code them to be, but because Riot doesn’t want them to be affected by tenacity
You think? Because I'm pretty sure the word "lazy" comes to mind when riot has to add stuns to the end of them for the knock-up to still work properly. It's a joke.
